questiontext.text: We compare 3 treatments using a Completely Randomized Design-ANOVA with 6 observations per treatment. The test size to see if the population averages of the treatments differ then follows an F-distribution with

answer.text: 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator.

feedback.text: 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator…: Incorrect

answer.text: 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator.

feedback.text: 2 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator…: Correct

answer.text: 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator.

feedback.text: 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 10 in the denominator…: Incorrect

answer.text: 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator.

feedback.text: 3 degrees of freedom in the numerator and 15 in the denominator…: Incorrect
